news.headline: Palantir’s Miserable Week Mints Billions for Struggling Shorts

news.headline: Heard on the Street Recap: AI Trade Down
news.summary: What Happened in Markets Today: Techs sell off—again. Two days don't make a trend, but investors definitely seem to be having second thoughts on the market's recent AI-fueled upswing. All eight tech companies sporting market values over $1 trillion closed another day in the red Wednesday.
